languages.text: {n}За мутантами установлено наблюдение. Один из надзирателей обнаружил в руках группы немочей таинственную реликвию, на проверку оказавшуюся творением ксеносов. Маловероятно, что сами выродки понимали, чему поклонялись.{/n}

{n}The mutants were put under surveillance. One of the watchmen spotted a mysterious relic in the hands of a group of retches that turned out to be an item of xeno-origin. It is unlikely the mutants understood the nature of the object they worshipped.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}За мутантами установлено наблюдение. Один из надзирателей обнаружил в руках группы немочей таинственную реликвию, на проверку оказавшуюся творением ксеносов. Маловероятно, что сами выродки понимали, чему поклонялись.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The mutants were put under surveillance. One of the wardens spotted a mysterious relic in the hands of a group of wretches that turned out to be an item of xeno origin. It is unlikely the mutants understood the nature of the object they worshipped.{/n}

{n}The mutants were put under surveillance. One of the watchmen spotted a mysterious relic in the hands of a group of retches that turned out to be an item of xeno-origin. It is unlikely the mutants understood the nature of the object they worshipped.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se está vigilando a los mutantes. Uno de los vigías descubrió una misteriosa reliquia en manos de un grupo de degenerados que resultó ser un objeto de origen xenos. Es poco probable que los mutantes comprendieran la naturaleza del objeto de su adoración.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutants were put under surveillance. One of the watchmen spotted a mysterious relic in the hands of a group of retches that turned out to be an item of xeno-origin. It is unlikely the mutants understood the nature of the object they worshipped.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se está vigilando a los mutantes. Uno de los vigías descubrió una misteriosa reliquia en manos de un grupo de degenerados que resultó ser un objeto de origen xenos. Es poco probable que los mutantes comprendieran la naturaleza del objeto de su adoración.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les mutants ont été placés sous surveillance. L'un des gardiens a aperçu, entre les mains d'un groupe d'infâmes, une mystérieuse relique qui s'est révélée être un artefact d'origine xénos. Il est peu probable que les mutants aient compris à quoi ils avaient affaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutants were put under surveillance. One of the watchmen spotted a mysterious relic in the hands of a group of retches that turned out to be an item of xeno-origin. It is unlikely the mutants understood the nature of the object they worshipped.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mutants ont été placés sous surveillance. L'un des gardiens a aperçu, entre les mains d'un groupe d'infâmes, une mystérieuse relique qui s'est révélée être un artefact d'origine xénos. Il est peu probable que les mutants aient compris à quoi ils avaient affaire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}变种人被置于严密的监督之下。在那之后，一名守卫从一群丑恶种手中缴获了一件神秘的遗物。研究表明，这件遗物是异形制品，但那些变种人恐怕不太可能知道他们崇拜的圣物究竟是什么。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutants were put under surveillance. One of the watchmen spotted a mysterious relic in the hands of a group of retches that turned out to be an item of xeno-origin. It is unlikely the mutants understood the nature of the object they worshipped.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}变种人被置于严密的监督之下。在那之后，一名守卫从一群丑恶种手中缴获了一件神秘的遗物。研究表明，这件遗物是异形制品，但那些变种人恐怕不太可能知道他们崇拜的圣物究竟是什么。{/n}

languages.text: {n}変異体たちは監視下に置かれた。監視員の一人が、ある集団の手に謎の遺物があるのを発見した。それはどうやら、異種族を起源とする道具のようだ。変異体たちは、自分たちが崇拝しているものの性質を理解していたとは思えない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutants were put under surveillance. One of the watchmen spotted a mysterious relic in the hands of a group of retches that turned out to be an item of xeno-origin. It is unlikely the mutants understood the nature of the object they worshipped.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}変異体たちは監視下に置かれた。監視員の一人が、ある集団の手に謎の遺物があるのを発見した。それはどうやら、異種族を起源とする道具のようだ。変異体たちは、自分たちが崇拝しているものの性質を理解していたとは思えない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Mutanten wurden unter Beobachtung gestellt. Einer der Wächter hat in den Händen einer Gruppe von Speiern ein mysteriöses Relikt entdeckt, das sich als Xeno-Artefakt entpuppt hat. Die Mutanten begreifen wohl gar nicht, was sie da verehrt haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutants were put under surveillance. One of the watchmen spotted a mysterious relic in the hands of a group of retches that turned out to be an item of xeno-origin. It is unlikely the mutants understood the nature of the object they worshipped.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Mutanten wurden unter Beobachtung gestellt. Einer der Wächter hat in den Händen einer Gruppe von Speiern ein mysteriöses Relikt entdeckt, das sich als Xeno-Artefakt entpuppt hat. Die Mutanten begreifen wohl gar nicht, was sie da verehrt haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mutantlar, gözlem altında tutuldu. Bekçilerden biri, bir grup leşin ellerine geçmiş gizemli bir yadigâr fark etti. Yadigârın sonradan zeno kökenli olduğu anlaşıldı. Mutantların tapındıkları bu nesnenin tabiatını anlamış olması pek olası değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutants were put under surveillance. One of the watchmen spotted a mysterious relic in the hands of a group of retches that turned out to be an item of xeno-origin. It is unlikely the mutants understood the nature of the object they worshipped.{/n}
